Description: Standard menu with graphic menu items.
Name: Button Menu

Description: Standard menu with textual menu items.
Name: Menu

Description: Standard clickable button.
Name: Button

Description: Short text field. Does not allow paragraph breaks use scroll bars.
Name: Text - Short

Description: Frame for full screen display.
Name: View

Description: Tabbed grouping of information. Partial screen display.
Name: Group

Description: Grouped display of related information.
Name: Block

Description: Non-editable text label
Name: Text - Static

Description: Present information as list of attribute-value pairs.
Name: Attribute Group

Description: Mathematical plot of data.
Name: Chart

Description: Control boundaries of geospatial region.
Name: Geospatial Extent

Description: Control boundaries of temporal region.
Name: Temporal Extent

Description: Extended text field. Allows free form text entry including multiple paragraphs.
Name: Text - Extended

Description: Present information in a 2-d tabular form.
Name: Table

Description: Present information as a set of radio buttons (only one value possible).
Name: Radio Button

Description: Interactive map display
Name: Map

Description: 2-d network graph display
Name: Graph

Description: Present controlled vocabulary for value selection.
Name: Dropdown

Description: Present information as boolean selection value.
Name: Checkbox

Description: Popup display of information.
Name: Callout

Description: Wireframe map to display current geographic context and/or control interactive map widget.
Name: Context Map

Description: Repeating information elements - as in a table, but without table headers, borders and behavior
Name: List

Description: Image and information values presented as visual tile
Name: Tile

Description: Control boundaries of vertical region.
Name: Vertical Extent

Description: Display element as image
Name: Image
